verses.roman:
aśru, kampa, gadgada prabhura kṛpāte
netra kaṇṭha rodhe bāṣpa, nā pāre paḍite

synonyms: aśru—tears; kampa—trembling; gadgada—faltering of the voice; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛpāte—by the mercy; netra—eyes; kaṇṭha—neck; rodhe—choked up; bāṣpa—tears; nā pāre paḍite—could not recite.
translation: By the mercy of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, he experienced the symptoms of ecstatic love-tears, trembling, and faltering of the voice. His eyes filled with tears, his throat became choked, and thus he could not recite Śrīmad Bhāgavatam.
